original_text: One day God will punish the people from that town. Yes, he will punish them more than the people who lived in Sodom long ago.’
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하노니 그 날에 소돔이 그 동네보다 견디기 쉬우리라

sentences.original_text: One day God will punish the people from that town.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 언젠가 그 동네 사람들을 벌하실 것이다.

sentences.original_text: more than the people who lived in Sodom long ago.'
sentences.korean_translation: 오래전 소돔에 살았던 사람들보다 더 심하게.
